text: Besides the external factors that you can not control anyway (such as an earth quake that destroy your city), **all of the outcomes you will got** comes from your **knowledge, decisions, and actions**. And even for external events, how you response to them is crucial. This famous quote by Charles R. Swindoll captures the essential of this idea: "Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I :1: it".
